content:
Long time ago this place was called by the people due to, there were many  plants of so called “Bagakay”.  Because of the place still has no name, the people name  it “bagakay”.  In the year 1911 Brgy. Captain were so called Tenyente.  The following were tenyente:

 

  1. Magdalino Umaslay                               5. Santiago Diez
  2. Erenio Arañez   Benito Arañez                6.  Benito Arañez
  3. Elesio Delgada   Teodoro Petalino           7.  Teodoro Petalino
  4. Victor Gonzales                                    8.  Arcadio Sumampong

The last captain of that year was the one transferred the church from the other place to the permanent location.

In the year 1924, people from the places migrate to our place and the population were increased.  The name Bagakay was change to “Hitudpan” because of the place a long ______________ and the name it “tudpan” and they added “Hi” so it became Hitudpan.

In the year, 1940-47-48-1960.

The Barrio Captain were:

  1. Gaudencio Arañez                                  6. Cornillio Arañez
  2. Francisco Bulawin                                  7. Alejo Juya
  3. Arcadio Sumampong                              8. Stevan Kalakat
  4. Bernabe Ballono                                    9. Uldarico Evaritas
  5. Pedro Saure                                          10. Iluminado Sumampong

In the year 1961-66 was Gaudencio Arañez then the next year 1967-69 the Brgy. Tenyente was Iluminado Sumampong then next is Olympio Arañez, then Teodorico Lingatong, then Cepriano Albarico, the acting captain.

The year 1987-93 the Brgy. Captain were Narciso Evaritas

At present, Hitudpan is under the supervision of Wenceslao Arañez, and the name Hitudpan never change its original name.
